import axios from"axios";// Base URL for API requests
const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||"http://localhost:5000/api";// Create axios instance
const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL,headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"}});// Add a request interceptor to add the auth token to every request
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");if(token){// Use Authorization Bearer header (standard JWT auth)
config.headers["Authorization"]="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});// Add a response interceptor to handle token expiration
api.interceptors.response.use(response=>response,error=>{if(error.response&&error.response.status===401){// Token expired or invalid, logout user
localStorage.removeItem("token");window.location.href="/login";}return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
